title: Alex.Jones.Show.2008.07.06-chakra71
description:
Sunday July 6, 2008

Listen to Alex's Sunday Edition, a round-up of the week past and the week ahead, broadcast from the studios of KLBJ AM in Austin, Texas. 4:00pm ? 6:00pm CST and syndicated coast to coast.

News and open lines both hours.

Sourced from the 32 Kbps live stream using Total Recorder 7 Pro, or from the 42 Kbps podcast.  Re-encoded to 32 Kbps @ 22.05 KHz.  Editing done using Nero WaveEditor 4 by hand. Two hours duration before commercial edit takes it down to about 1 hour 20 minutes of playing time.
